name: COLLECTE LOCALISATION SATELLITES SA
goal:
CLS is a global company operating satellite systems and providing high value-added products services.
The company is committed to work for a protected, preserved, sustainably exploited and healthy planet through space solutions. The company operates in six strategic business sectors: sustainable fisheries management, environmental monitoring, maritime safety and security, fleet management, energy & mining, and space & ground systems.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Environmental directives ex. Natura 2000 and protected Marine Areas, Maritime Strategy Framework Directive, Water Framework Directives, Habitats and Birds directives, Flood directives, other conservation plans for living component
Seas and oceans framework:
Integrated Maritime Policy including Blue growth and sea basin strategies, Maritime Data and Knowledge, Maritime Spatial Planning, Integrated maritime surveillance, Maritime security strategy, Fishery / Fish management, Energy sector, Space sector etc..
